short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Labels news (left/right-leaning, neutral, satire, or fake) on your Facebook feed based on their source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Labels news as being left-leaning, right-leaning, neutral, satire, or fake with a colored border and label on your Facebook feed based on their source. Add your own sources (or people) that you also want the extension to mark.
